original_task: go to the desktop and make a new folder called pdf and then move all the pdfs present in the desktop into that pdf folder

steps.error_handling: If desktop directory does not exist, create it

steps.description: create a new folder in desktop
steps.success_criteria: 'pdf' folder is created on the desktop
steps.error_handling: If folder creation fails, abort the process

steps.description: List all files on the desktop
steps.success_criteria: Files on the desktop are listed
steps.error_handling: If listing fails, check directory permissions

steps.description: Search for all PDF files on the desktop
steps.success_criteria: PDF files are found on the desktop
steps.error_handling: If no PDF files are found, proceed to final step

steps.description: Move all PDF files to the 'pdf' folder
steps.success_criteria: PDF files are moved to the 'pdf' folder
steps.error_handling: If moving fails, check file permissions or disk space

overall_strategy: First, ensure the desktop and 'pdf' folder exist. Then, find and move PDF files to the 'pdf' folder.
risk_assessment: Possible risks include missing desktop folder, insufficient permissions, no PDF files present. Mitigation includes creating folders if missing, checking permissions, and handling cases with no PDF files.
